about_the_game:
With 10 tracks full of synth and electronic tunes, this pack is perfect for carrying the atmosphere of your game straight into the future!

Explore the city to the relaxed beats of "bad day", or race through the streets to the urgent tones of "fear". Build the tension with the anxious melody of "cold" and then bring down the hammer with the driving guitar of "heat"! Be sure to grab Futuristic Cyberpunk Music today.


Contents:

* 10 royalty-free BGM
* ogg and m4a formats

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

Tracklist:

01_enigma
02_bad day
03_bush
04_pulse
05_fear
06_silence
07_cold
08_heat
09_nemesis
10_rusty
